name: Olympian Sky
description:
Welcome to the Olympian Sky!

Training is in session! Do you have what it takes to be among the clouds?

Swing punches and kicks at the orb! After 10 seconds, use your final smash to launch it across the sky and claim your prize!

We recommend downloading the game for Windows/Mac for the full experience.

Controls

  • Press spacebar to begin the game
  • Use A-Z Keys to fulfill each prompt/attack orb
  • Use spacebar to launch orb
  • (PC Only) Escape to exit the game

**Disclaimer** A-Z Key prompts are randomly generated. Any combination of words spelt during gameplay are purely random and unintentional. 

Credits

Made for TOJam: Feels Like a Rerun! With the 2021 theme, “Once More, With Feeling!”

  • Programmer, Cole Azevedo (@colewithagoal)
  • 2D Artist/Illustrator, Alexis Young (@_Leaniro)
  • Sounds: BBC Sound Effects and freesound.org
  • Music: incompetech.com

Made with Unity and Procreate
